titleStmt.title: The gratefull seruant A comedie. As it was lately presented with good applause at the priuate House in Drury-Lane, by her Majesties Servants. Written by Iames Shirley Gent.
titleStmt.author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B[ernard] A[lsop] and T[homas] F[awcet] for Iohn Groue, and are to be sold at his shop at Furnivals-Inne gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
